prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies the essence of flowers and nature.
I want a Pokemon that can transform between land and sky, showcasing vibrant colors.
Generate a tiny Pokemon with a cute, round body and floral features.
Make a mythical creature that has a hedgehog-like appearance and green foliage.
Imagine a Pokemon that represents spring with soft pink and lush green colors.
Design a Pokemon that can heal nature and has a gentle demeanor.
Show me a small, fluffy Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats.
